analysis.description:
InvestToken.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x52d757cb8be2ebd32af051b26898bce28ec19f13.sol#2010-2019) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- seller.transfer(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x52d757cb8be2ebd32af051b26898bce28ec19f13.sol#2017)
